name: Fruit Drop Pro
description:
No Ads and all the fun

Fruit Drops is an amazing adventure into a magical land made all of Fruit. Watch fruits fall out of the sky. Tap on the fruits to collect them. But avoid hitting the bad fruit.

Ensure to tap as fast as you can, to ensure not to miss any fruits. Click on special item such as the x2 – to earn double the points, the snowflake to freeze and the no bombs icon to remove the bombs. The game is extremely addictive and will have you playing for hours on end.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Fruit Drops!
